feature.name: Advantage bank UI testing

scenario.name: Check if user is able to login to Advantage bank

step.name: Given user logs into Advantage bank
Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open

scenario.name: Check if user can register in advantage bank portal

step.name: Given user navigates to advantage bank url
And click on Register tab
Then user enters all fields in the registration page
And click on "Register" button
Then User must be registered

scenario.name: Check if all the navigation tabs are available and working

step.name: Given user logs into Advantage bank
Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open
Then user click on "Accounts" tab on dashboard
Then user gets prompted with my accounts page
Then user click on "New Transfer" tab on dashboard
Then user click on "Loans" tab on dashboard
Then user click on "Cards" tab on dashboard
Then user click on "Forecasts" tab on dashboard
Then user click on "Stocks" tab on dashboard

scenario.name: Check if user can log-in to AOB portal using social media

step.name: Given user navigates to advantage bank url for social media login
And User click on Google tab
And user enters their respective Gmail address and password and click on next
step.error_message: java.util.NoSuchElementException at java.base/java.util.LinkedHashMap$LinkedHashIterator.nextNode(LinkedHashMap.java:758) at java.base/java.util.LinkedHashMap$LinkedKeyIterator.next(LinkedHashMap.java:778) at glue.LoginSteps.user_enters_their_respective_Gmail_address_and_password_and_click_on_next(LoginSteps.java:133) at âœ½.user enters their respective Gmail address and password and click on next(file:src/test/java/resources/BDD_AOB_Automation_5002.feature:37)

step.name: Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open
Then close app

scenario.name: Check if user is able to use the management console

step.name: Given user logs into Advantage bank
Then A default Log in window of Advantage Bank Portal Should Open
Then user clicks on profile icon
Then user clicks on Management Console in the list
Then a new tab should open
Then user clicks on merchants
Then a list of merchants should appear for the user
